name: Blocky Galaxy
description:
Story

The galaxy is a dangerous place! Can you defeat all the threats and bring peace to the galaxy?

Controls

Movement:                   WASD

Teleport:                     Left-Click

Shooting:                    E

Shrink:                       Hold Shift

Special Attack:               Space-Bar

Pause:                       Esc

Other Info

The game auto-saves every time you defeat a boss

Shoot the comets to select them

The teleport and special attack have a cooldown

The "Erase" comet will erase your save file
